text: Pavel Kastramin (born 12 July 1991) is a boxer from Belarus. He represented Belarus at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's welterweight, where he lost to Sailom Adi of Thailand in the first round by split decision. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian male boxers Category:Olympic boxers of Belarus Category:Boxers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Welterweight boxers
title: Pavel Kastramin
